title: How-To: Executing Queries from Powershell and Bash
description:
Explains how to run LogScale queries via the HTTP/REST API using common CLI tools like curl,
with examples for both Bash and PowerShell invoking /api/v1/structured or similar endpoints.

examples.name: Execute query with curl (Bash)
